EmailTemplate.description: Email template used to send IST Account Managers reminders about a dealers docs going out to compliance soon.
EmailTemplate.name: Dealer Doc Expiration Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Dealer Doc Expiring Soon for Account {!Dealer_Docs__c.Account__c}, {!Dealer_Docs__c.Dealer_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Dealer_Docs__c.Account__c},
Your {!Dealer_Docs__c.RecordType} is going to expire on {!Dealer_Docs__c.Expiration_Date__c}.
Please log in to your ACV Auctions App to provide a current document. If you have any questions or concerns please email us at acvinfo@acvauctions.com or contact your account manager for further assistance.
Thank you for being a valued ACV dealer partner!
640 Ellicott St #321 Buffalo, NY 14203 www.acvauctions.com
Want to change how you receive these emails? You can update your preferences or unsubscribe.
Copyright Â© 2018 ACV Auctions, All rights reserved.
